description:
11.294 zoompan
Apply Zoom & Pan effect.

This filter accepts the following options:


Each expression can contain the following constants:
name: zoompan

options.description: Set the zoom expression. Range is 1-10. Default is 1.
options.name: zoom

options.description: Set the x and y expression. Default is 0.
options.name: x

options.description: Set the x and y expression. Default is 0.
options.name: y

options.description: Set the duration expression in number of frames. This sets for how many number of frames effect will last for single input image. Default is 90.
options.name: d

options.description: Set the output image size, default is ’hd720’.
options.name: s

options.description: Set the output frame rate, default is ’25’.
options.name: fps
